input_text:
Job Title: Maintenance Technician

Location: Columbus, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
What You’ll Do:

As a Maintenance Technician, you’ll serve our residents by ensuring the proper maintenance and upkeep of the property. You’ll perform a variety of maintenance tasks to maintain and enhance the value of the community and maximize the living experience of our residents. This is a full-time, non-exempt position reporting to the Property Manager.

Where You’ll Work:

Luxe 88 is a 220-unit conventional community located in Columbus, OH. Luxe 88 is less than 5 miles from OSU and near OH-315. On-site amenities include a resort-style pool with private cabanas, two-story clubhouse with a resident lounge & bar, personal training studio with interactive fitness mirrors, on-site massage therapist, and a movie theater. The one and two-bedroom apartments feature stainless steel appliances, kitchen with tiled backsplash and oversized island, granite countertops, double espresso cabinetry, oversized walk-in closets, private balcony, and an accent wall in the master bedroom.

Your Responsibilities:

Ensure all service requests are completed properly and in a timely manner, including after-hours requests. Participate in the on-call rotation with the rest of the maintenance team. Execute the turnover of units and make-readies for new residents. Assist in the daily clean up of the exterior of the community including grounds, breezeways and all common areas. Perform swimming pool maintenance, where applicable. Maintain thorough knowledge of company, property, and maintenance policies, including attending all required training. Provide care, maintenance and inventory of all supplies and equipment owned by the company. Keep storage areas, tools, and equipment secure at all times. Maintain the required uniform and ensure a professional appearance. Ensure compliance with OSHA standards and company safety policies. Utilize property resources, equipment and supplies economically. Other duties as directed and assigned

Required Qualifications:

High school diploma or equivalent required. Previous general maintenance experience including HVAC, electrical, plumbing, appliances, strongly preferred. EPA Certification (Type I and II) preferred. May be required in some locations. Must be able to frequently walk and occasionally stoop, kneel, crouch or crawl. Must be able to lift/move loads up to 50lbs as well as use a ladder. Must live within 30 miles of the assigned property and have reliable transportation to participate in on-call duties. Basic computer skills required. Ability to speak elementary English required.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Maintenance Technician
